channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: alibaba /OpenSandbox | Python | N/A
item.description: OpenSandbox is a general-purpose sandbox platform for AI applications, offering multi-language SDKs, unified sandbox APIs, and Docker/Kubernetes runtimes for scenarios like Coding Agents, GUI Agents, Agent Evaluation, AI Code Execution, and RL Training.

item.title: steipete /CodexBar | Swift | N/A
item.description: Show usage stats for OpenAI Codex and Claude Code, without having to login.

item.description: RuVector is a High Performance, Real-Time, Self-Learning, Vector Graph Neural Network, and Database built in Rust.

item.title: anthropics /claude-code | Shell | N/A
item.description: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

item.title: moeru-ai /airi | TypeScript | N/A

item.title: abhigyanpatwari /GitNexus | TypeScript | N/A
item.description: GitNexus: The Zero-Server Code Intelligence Engine - GitNexus is a client-side knowledge graph creator that runs entirely in your browser. Drop in a GitHub repo or ZIP file, and get an interactive knowledge graph wit a built in Graph RAG Agent. Perfect for code exploration

item.title: bytedance /deer-flow | TypeScript | N/A
item.description: An open-source SuperAgent harness that researches, codes, and creates. With the help of sandboxes, memories, tools, skills and subagents, it handles different levels of tasks that could take minutes to hours.

item.title: ruvnet /wifi-densepose | Python | N/A
item.description: Production-ready implementation of InvisPose - a revolutionary WiFi-based dense human pose estimation system that enables real-time full-body tracking through walls using commodity mesh routers
